title: EastEnders spoilers: New romance, a shocking secret revealed and more
text:
After being ushered out of the country at Mel Owen’s (Tamzin Outhwaite) request, Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean) returns to the Square in our latest EastEnders spoilers, and she’s not ready to back down without a fight. However, Mel makes matters more complicated, when she gets Ruby Allen (Louisa Lytton) involved in her feud with the Mitchell matriarch.

Elsewhere, Honey Mitchell (Emma Barton) faces heartache when Mariam Ahmed (Indira Joshi) confronts her over Habiba’s (Rukku Nahar) affair with Adam Bateman (Stephen Rahman-Hughes), and the Panesar brothers arrive in Walford.

10 EastEnders spoilers Sharon’s back from her trip to Portugal

Mel makes Ruby a surprise offer

Ian confronts Iqra and Keegan

The Panesar clan arrive in Walford

Mariam confronts Honey over Adam’s affair

Ben shares a shocking secret with Sharon

Sparks fly between Whitney and Leo

Mel goes to desperate lengths

Adam shows his true colours

Jack tries to put Tiffany and Keegan off their engagment

Monday 28th October

Sharon returns home from her trip to Portugal all by herself, and Louise is quick to inform her that both herself and Keanu are intent on moving to Portugal. Sharon feign surprise, but Keanu soon confronts her on the matter, pleading with her to stop Louise.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Mel offers Ruby first refusal to purchase E20, leaving Ruby shocked. Ruby doesn’t believe that Sharon will sell, but Mel insists that she will, and later pays her a visit to ensure that she does by delivering yet another threat.

Mariam has a heart-to-heart with Adam after confronting him over his affair with Habiba, and Lisa’s anger grows when Mel meddles with Louise’s future.

Tuesday 29th October

Kheerat, Jags and Vinny Panesar arrive in Walford, and — worried they’re here for him — Ben proceeds to confront them. However, it soon become apparent that their presence in Walford is for a different reason entirely, as Jags recognises a familiar face.

Ruby pays Sharon a visit to discuss the sale of the club, but Sharon disputes the amount offered and the pair end up arguing. Ben questions Sharon’s desire to sell the club, but which leads her to admit that Mel is the reason she’s doing so. As a result, Ben shares a secret with Sharon.

Mariam tells Honey that she’s aware of Adam’s affair with Habiba, but Honey denies having any knowledge of such a thing, before accusing Mariam of trying to split them up. Dotty trees to sabotage Keegan’s business, while Linda makes the final preparations for The Queen Vic’s impending Halloween party.

Thursday 31st October

With the day of The Queen Vic’s Halloween party on the horizon, Honey demands that Adam attend with her after he makes alternative plans. Adam agrees to go with her but, at the party, she’s distracted due to Habiba’s arrival, and thus she seeks some relationship advice from Mick.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Following a conversation with Chantelle at the party, romance ensues between Whitney and Leo and — with some new information courtesy of Ben — Sharon confronts Mel.

Friday 1st November

With Mel getting on his nerves, Keanu vents to Lisa and — after a false alarm with Louise and the baby — Lisa begins to realise how overbearing Mel is getting. Karen is devastated when Ben informs her that Keanu and Louise are both moving to Portugal.

Adam shows his true colours — unaware that Mariam is listening —, Tiffany is fuming with Dotty when she learns what she did to Keegan’s business, and Bobby is left upset when Ian becomes obsessed with becoming Walford’s new councillor.

description: After being ushered out of the country at Mel Owen's (Tamzin Outhwaite) request, Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean) returns to the Square in our latest EastEnders spoilers, and she's not ready...
